author: Gabrielle Reyes, Gabrielle Reyes
title: Indonesians Dress Up as 'Ghosts' to Scare People into Social Distancing
description: Residents in some Indonesian villages are dressing up as ghosts to scare people into following social distancing measures during the coronavirus pandemic, Reuters reported on Tuesday.
content:
Residents in some Indonesian villages are dressing up as ghosts to scare people into following social distancing measures during the coronavirus pandemic, Reuters reported on Tuesday.
On the island of Java, locals are dressing up as pocong — shroud ghosts of… [+2493 chars]
